files.patch: @@ -150,1 +150,1 @@ - * stdout.encoding. + * {@link ##stdout.encoding stdout.encoding}. @@ -170,1 +170,1 @@ - * @see stdout.encoding + * @see ##stdout.encoding stdout.encoding @@ -186,2 +186,1 @@ - * equivalent to {@link Console#charset()} if the {@code Console} - * exists, stderr.encoding otherwise. + * equivalent to {@link ##stderr.encoding stderr.encoding}. @@ -189,2 +188,1 @@ - * @see Console#charset() - * @see stderr.encoding + * @see ##stderr.encoding stderr.encoding
